You are docked at an abbey of the Sisters of Domina. A woman wearing a flowing cardinal robe is before you.
"Take your ease here before you go, or seek guidance at our Sanctum. May the blessings of Domina protect you."

(cat "You enter the abbess's spartan office and chat with her. She leaves you with " "a small piece of advice:\n\n"
(objTranslate gSource (cat 'descAbbessAdvice (min (sysGetLevel) 7))) )
"\"You are one of the few who can commune with Domina; do not waste this blessing.\""
"\"Do not kill for sport. But do not be afraid to fight for Domina.\""
"\"Domina seeks connection with all thinking beings, and even death cannot fully erase the luminous patterns of sentience.\""
"\"Domina can guide you, but you must seek your own answers.\""
"\"Do not let Domina's brilliance blind you to the strength and worth of mere humans.\""
"\"Domina controls you, but it's up to you to keep your humanity. Always remember that.\""
"\"The universe is dark and lonely; I do not envy your task.\""
"Contemplation and communion"

Actions.Action:
(block ( (roll (random 1 100)) )
; Consume 1 attitude point
(objIncData gPlayerShip 'sistersAttitude -1)
; If we have a free sanctum pass then we always get the stargate ; option.
(if (objGetData gSource 'freeSanctum) (block Nil (setq roll 40) (objSetData gSource 'freeSanctum Nil) ) )
; Figure out what happened
(switch
; If we're not a Pilgrim, we always get nothing
(not (eq (objGetProperty gPlayerShip 'characterClass) &unidPilgrimClass;)) (scrShowPane gScreen "Nothing")
; 10% of the time, Domina reveals stations in the system
(leq roll 10) (block Nil (enum (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "Ts -uncharted;") obj (objSetKnown obj) ) (scrShowPane gScreen "MappedSystem") )
; 30% of the time, Domina reveals the stargate that leads ; to the Core.
(leq roll 40) (block ( (stargateObj (sysGetStargateLeadingToCore)) systemMessage )
(switch
; If we get a stargate result, then tell the player to ; follow the stargate.
stargateObj (block Nil (objSetKnown stargateObj) (scrSetData gScreen 'stargateID (objGetID stargateObj)) (scrShowPane gScreen "StargateRevealed") )
; Otherwise, see if the system has some text to explain where ; to go. We need this for the Heretic system.
(setq systemMessage (typTranslate (sysGetSystemType) 'sisters.dominaRevealStargate)) (block Nil (scrSetData gScreen 'stargateID Nil) (scrSetData gScreen 'stargateText systemMessage) (scrShowPane gScreen "StargateRevealed") )
; Otherwise, nothing
(scrShowPane gScreen "Nothing") ) )
; 30% of the time we gain Domina relationship.
(leq roll 70) (block Nil (domGainXP (random 20 10 10)) (scrShowPane gScreen "DominaRelationship") )
; 30% of the time, nothing happens.
(scrShowPane gScreen "Nothing") ) )

Language.Text: "[C]ontemplate"

Your disembodied mind hurtles through space. Stars dance like fireflies, and nebulous veils part to reveal a fragment of the Eternal Pattern.
You feel the blessing of Domina upon you. She urges you to continue your journey to the Galactic Core.

Images and patterns dance in your head like spinning galaxies. You see with the eyes of Domina but the visions blast your brain like a nova.
When you recover from your reverie you remember only some mundane information about the position of stations in this star system.
Your contemplation ends as your rational mind considers the impossibility of communicating across the light-years.

You are in the sanctum of the Sisters of Domina. Tools and scaffolding fill the room and various cardinal-robed techs work to repair the micro-engraved plasteel walls.
One of the sisters oversees the work: "Sorry, but the sanctum is closed for maintenance. We would appreciate any donation you can make to help us defray the cost."

You are in the sanctum of the Sisters of Domina. The plasteel walls that surround you are micro-engraved with the revelation of Domina.
You close your eyes and open your thoughts, but no one answers.

(cat "You are in the sanctum of the Sisters of Domina. " "The plasteel walls that surround you are micro-engraved with the revelation of Domina.\n\n"
"You are a novice in the service of Domina and have access to first-tier powers. " (if (typGetGlobalData &stDomina; "xp") (cat "The strength of your connection to Domina is: " (typGetGlobalData &stDomina; "xp") ".") ) )

(cat "You are in the sanctum of the Sisters of Domina. " "The plasteel walls that surround you are micro-engraved with the revelation of Domina.\n\n"

Language.Text: Domina [P]owers
"Welcome, Pilgrim! Your journey to the Galactic Core will be long and arduous but we are here to help those of pure spirit and in true need."
"Welcome! Domina asks that we help those in need. Our powers in the material world are at your service."
"Sadly, we do not have any fuel compatible with your vessel."
"Your vessel does not need any fuel."
"Your personal funds exceed our own. It is the wish of Domina that we help only those truly in need."
"Our abbey has fallen on hard times and we cannot afford to help you. Please consider donating funds or items when you are able."
"Your vessel has been refueled. Go in peace and spread the teachings of Domina."
Language.String: "Your vessel is undamaged. There is no need for repairs."
Language.Text: "Your vessel has been repaired as best as we could manage. Devote your life to Domina and your spirit shall be similarly healed."
"Please forgive us, but it is the wish of Domina that we help only those truly in need."
"The damage to your vessel is beyond our capability to repair. Open yourself to Domina and leave your worthless ship behind."
